text:
While installing httpd-2.4.18 on HP Non Stop, not able to create .so file in modules. It is creating only .a file, but httpd.conf requires .so file.
How to create .so file ?
creator: hemantdude.chaudhary@gmail.com

text:
This bugzilla is for reporting bugs only, not support.
Please wait for an answer on the users mailing list (which is suitable for support, and where you already started this subject), it shouldn't be too long.
